metadata.name: Aku Chapter III: Escape #1/570
metadata.description: In a time where much of our lives are spent in the digital world, the anxiety and pressure to measure up to others can have a major impact on our well-being. At one point or another, we all ask ourselves, "Am I doing enough?". Aku must navigate through the same challenges we all face. Thankfully, Aku has found an escape.
